member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.ABTest
member.summary: Central test object that keeps track of everything related to a marketing test.

member.summary: Base class used for A/B test model objects.

member.summary: ID of an AB Test object.

member.summary: Date this object was created.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.CoreEntityBase.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date this object was updated or modified.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.CountType
member.summary: IncrementCount call uses this to know which increase.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.CountType.View
member.summary: Represents when a user views the item under test.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.CountType.Conversion
member.summary: Represents when a user converts based on the KPI(s) associated with a test.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.KeyResultType
member.summary: Type of KPI data to save.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.KeyResultType.Financial
member.summary: A monetary value.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.KeyResultType.Value
member.summary: Any non monetary amount.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.KeyResultType.Conversion
member.summary: Boolean conversion result used with multiple KPIs.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.TestState
member.summary: Defines the possible states that a test can be in at any given time.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.TestState.Inactive
member.summary: Test has been created and scheduled to be run but has not reached its start date yet.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.TestState.Active
member.summary: Test has started and is currently running.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.TestState.Done
member.summary: Test has completed by reaching its end date.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.TestState.Archived
member.summary: A winning variant has been picked and published.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult
member.summary: This interface defines the minimal required fields for a KPI result to contain in order to be tied to a KPI that is part of a test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult.Id
member.summary: ID of a result recored.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult.KpiId
member.summary: ID of KPI this result is associated with.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult.CreatedDate
member.summary: Date this result was created.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date this result was modified.

member.summary: Defines the minimum data set required for a marketing test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.Id
member.summary: Test ID.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.Title
member.summary: Test name.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.Description
member.summary: Test Description.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.Owner
member.summary: Creator of the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.OriginalItemId
member.summary: Item being tested against. This is the current published version of content.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.State
member.summary: Current state of the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.StartDate
member.summary: Date and time the test is scheduled to start.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.EndDate
member.summary: Date and time the test is scheduled to end.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.ParticipationPercentage
member.summary: Percentage of users that visit the site to include in the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.ConfidenceLevel
member.summary: Percentage of accuracy required. Default: 95 %

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.ZScore
member.summary: Calculated Z-Score to determine statistical significance.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.IsSignificant
member.summary: Once the test is completed, this is filled in based on the statistical calculations around significance.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.ContentLanguage
member.summary: Language of the site for the content being tested.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.LastModifiedBy
member.summary: The person that last changed the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.CreatedDate
member.summary: Date and time the test was created.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last time the test was modified.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.Variants
member.summary: List of variant items. These replace the OriginalItem during the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest.KpiInstances
member.summary: List of KPIs. These can be time on a page, form submission, etc.

member.summary: Number of conversions for a KPI.

member.summary: Weight given to a KPI.

member.summary: Percentage of overal conversion rate that a specific KPI contributed.

member.summary: ID of the variant the result pertains to.

member.summary: The variant the result pertains to.

member.summary: Financial value to be saved.

member.summary: String representing the commerce "market" to be used for financial conversions "Default" represents the default market as defined in the system.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.KeyFinancialResult.ConvertedTotal
member.summary: Total converted to the current market, this could be the same as Total if the order currency matches the market culture currency.

member.summary: String representing the culture used to convert the currency total.

member.summary: ID of the variant the result pertains to.

member.summary: The variant the result pertains to.

member.summary: ID of the variant the result pertains to.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.KeyValueResult.Variant
member.summary: The variant the result pertains to.

member.summary: Used to filter testing data from the database. Multiple filters can be combined to create a criteria.

member.summary: Adds the given filter to the collection of criteria filters if the property on the filter doesn't exist. If the filter exists the filter will not be added.
member.param: The filter to add.

member.summary: Returns the list of filters that are part of the criteria.
member.returns: List of filters that are part of the criteria.

member.summary: Filters are added to a Test Criteria to build up a query to limit what data is returned.

member.summary: Used to filter test query results.
member.param: Test property to filter against.
AND or OR.
Value used to filter against(i.e. contentId, Active test state, etc.)

member.summary: The A/B test property that the filter will be based on.

member.summary: The limiter value that will be used to filter the result set.

member.summary: ID of the variant item under test.

member.summary: Represents the data stored in session cookies for users that visit an item under test.

member.summary: Date and time the test is set to start

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.TestId
member.summary: Test ID.

member.summary: ID of item under test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.TestVariantId
member.summary: ID of item variant being tested.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.ShowVariant
member.summary: States whether the current user sees the original item or the variant being tested.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.Viewed
member.summary: Has the current user viewed the item.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.Converted
member.summary: Has the current user converted based on the KPI(s) associated with the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.AlwaysEval
member.summary: States whether multiple conversions are possible.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestDataCookie.KpiConversionDictionary
member.summary: Keeps track of each kpi and its conversion state(i.e. converted or not).

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant
member.summary: Object that stores all info related to an item under test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.TestId
member.summary: ID of the test this variant is associated with.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.ItemId
member.summary: ID of modified content to use instead of the original item for a test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.ItemVersion
member.summary: Version of the content.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.IsWinner
member.summary: This is calculated and updated upon the completeion of a test or when a winner is chosen. True if variant won the test, false otherwise.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.Conversions
member.summary: A running count of how many users have converted after viewing the item under test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.Views
member.summary: A running count of how many users have viewed the item under test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.IsPublished
member.summary: States whether this version of the content is the currently puublished one or not at the start of the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.ABTest
member.summary: Reference to the test this is associated with.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.KeyFinancialResults
member.summary: A list of any financial results that are the result of a KPI associated with the test this variant is part of.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.KeyValueResults
member.summary: A list of any value results(i.e. any numerical value that is not fiancial in nature) that are the result of a KPI associated with the test this variant is part of.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Variant.KeyConversionResults
member.summary: A list of conversion results that are related to a KPI.

Marketing event publisher
Test manager to defer to when tests are not in the cache
A logger.
Cache timeout in seconds.

member.summary: The ICacheSignal interface defines a component that is capable of signaling a cache's validity.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ICacheSignal.Monitor(System.Action)
member.summary: Registers a callback which will be invoked when a the cache has been invalidated.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ICacheSignal.Reset
member.summary: Signals that the cache is invalid.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ICacheSignal.Set
member.summary: Signals that the cache is now valid.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents
member.summary: Defines all the events that the testing service can produce.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestSaved
member.summary: Occurs after a test has been created or updated. have been made.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestDeleted
member.summary: Occurs after a test has been deleted. have been made

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestStarted
member.summary: Occurs after a test has transitioned to the started state and cache changes made.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestStopped
member.summary: Occurs after a test has transitioned to the stopped state and cache changes made.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestArchived
member.summary: Occurs after a test has transitioned to the archived state. Content has been published and cache changes have been made.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestAddedToCache
member.summary: Occurs after a test has been added to the active test cache.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.TestRemovedFromCache
member.summary: Occurs after a test has been removed from the active test cache.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.ContentSwitched
member.summary: Occurs when content has the published content has been switched out with the test variant. This event will often fire multiple times for a single IContent.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.UserIncludedInTest
member.summary: Occurs when a user is included in an active test.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.KpiConverted
member.summary: Occurs when a Kpi is successfully converted.

member.name: E:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IMarketingTestingEvents.AllKpisConverted
member.summary: Occurs when all Kpis associated with a given test have been converted.

member.summary: Used to sepcify that type of count to increment.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.testId
member.summary: ID of a test to save the result to.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.itemVersion
member.summary: Version of the variant that should be updated.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.resultType
member.summary: Saves a KPI result. The result is appended to the list of results for a given variant version for a test for both historical and statistical calculations.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.kpiId
member.summary: ID of the KPI count to increment.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.asynch
member.summary: Boolean stating whether the result should be saved asynchronously or not.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria.clientId
member.summary: A unique identifier to throttle overly agressive clients when performing a conversion update.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager
member.summary: Central point of access for test data and test manipulation.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.Get(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a test based on the supplied id from the database.
member.param: ID of the test to retrieve.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetActiveTests
member.summary: Gets a collection of tests that are currently active.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetActiveTestsByOriginalItemId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves all active tests that have the supplied OriginalItemId from the cache. The associated data for each test returned may not be current. If the most current data is required 'Get' should be used instead.
member.param: ID of the item under test.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetActiveTestsByOriginalItemId(System.Guid,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Retrieves all active tests that have the supplied OriginalItemId and ContentCulture name. The associated data for each test returned may not be current. If the most current data is required 'Get' should be used instead.
member.param: ID of the item under test.
Content Culture of the current loaded content.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetTestByItemId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves all tests, regardless of test state, that have the supplied OriginalItemId.
member.param: ID of the item under test.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetTestList(EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.TestCriteria)
member.summary: Don't want to use refernce the cache here. The criteria could be anything, not just active tests which is what the cache is intended to have in it.
member.param: A group of filters that are applied to the list of tests in order to limit what is returned.
member.returns: A list of tests based on the criteria passed in.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.IncrementCount(EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.IncrementCountCriteria)
member.summary: Increments a view or conversion by 1 for a given variant that is part of a given test.
member.param: Critera class to define what to increment.

members.member:
Increments a view or conversion by 1 for a given variant that is part of a given test.
ID of a test. Version of the variant that should be updated. ID of the KPI count to increment. /// Type of count to increment. Boolean stating whether the result should be saved asynchronously or not.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.ReturnLandingPage(System.Guid)
member.summary: Randomly decides if a new user is to be part of the ongoing test. If so, chooses 1 of the 2 variants that are part of the test to display to the user.
member.param: ID of a test.
member.returns: The original or variant item under test.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetVariantContent(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the variant content from the variant cache.
member.param: ID of the content to retrieve.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetVariantContent(System.Guid,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the variant content from the variant cache for the specified language.
member.param: ID of the content to retrieve.
Content Culture of the current loaded content.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.EvaluateKPIs(System.Collections.Generic.IList{EPiServer.Marketing.KPI.Manager.DataClass.IKpi},System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Given a list of KPIs and an EventArg object, each KPI will be evaluated and a list of KPI instances that have been evaluated will be returned.
member.param: List of KPIs to evaluate for conersion.
Sender of the event that pertains to the KPI.
Args associated with the KPIs.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.ITestManager.GetDatabaseVersion(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: If the database needs to be configured, then we return so that it can be set up. If it has already been configured, we get the version of the current KPI schema and upgrade it if it is an older version.
member.param: Connection properties for the desired database to connect to.
Schema that should be applied to the database (upgrade or downgrade) if the database is outdated.
The string used to identify the schema we are requesting the version of.
If this is run before the site is set up, we want to populate the cache with all active tests. By default, this is false.
member.returns: Database version of the testing schema.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.KpiEventArgs
member.summary: Used with testmanager KPI related events.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.KpiEventArgs.Kpi
member.summary: The KPI that the event relates to.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.KpiEventArgs.KpiConversionDictionary
member.summary: Keeps track of all the KPIs for a test and used to determine when they have all converted.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.KpiEventArgs.#ctor(EPiServer.Marketing.KPI.Manager.DataClass.IKpi,EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest)
member.param: The KPI that the event pertains to.
The test the event pertains to.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.KpiEventArgs.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Guid,System.Boolean},EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IMarketingTest)
member.param: Keeps track of each KPI that is part of the test and whether it has converted or not.
The test the event pertains to.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal
member.summary: The RemoteCacheSignal is a component that is capable of signaling the validity of a cache which must be synchronized with other remote nodes.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.#ctor(EPiServer.Framework.Cache.ISynchronizedObjectInstanceCache,EPiServer.Logging.ILogger,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The cache to monitor for validity
The key whose presence indicates validity
The frequency which which the cache should check for validity

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.Monitor(System.Action)
member.summary: Registers a callback which will be invoked if a node has indicated that caches should be invalidated.
member.param: Callback to execute

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.Reset
member.summary: Signals to remote nodes that caches should be invalidated.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.Set
member.summary: Signals that this node's cache is in a valid state.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.PollValidity(System.Object)
member.summary: Polls for the validity of the cache. If the cache is found to be invalid, the registered callback will be invoked.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.RemoteCacheSignal.IsCacheInvalid
member.summary: Determines whether the cache has been invalidated.
member.returns: True if the cache is invalid, false otherwise

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.TestEventArgs
member.summary: Used with testmanager IMarketing Test events as well as a base for KPI events.

member.param: A test.

The content to check.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.TestEventArgs.Test
member.summary: Test the event pertains to.

member.summary: Content that caused the event to fire.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.TestEventArgs.CurrentUser

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Manager.TestManager

member.summary: Saves a test to the database.
member.param: A test.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.AddKeyResultMessage
member.summary: Message used for saving any type of KPI result that implements IKeyResult.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.AddKeyResultMessage.TestId
member.summary: ID of the test that the KPI result pertains to.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.AddKeyResultMessage.ItemVersion
member.summary: Version of the variant that the KPI result pertains to.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.AddKeyResultMessage.Result
member.summary: The result data to save.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.AddKeyResultMessage.Type
member.summary: The type of result data to save.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateConversionsMessage
member.summary: Message used to increment the conversion count for a specific variant version of a test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateConversionsMessage.TestId
member.summary: ID of a test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateConversionsMessage.ItemVersion
member.summary: Version of the variant to increment its conversion count.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateConversionsMessage.KpiId
member.summary: ID of a KPI.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateConversionsMessage.ClientIdentifier
member.summary: Set this property to a unique value that is client specific to prevent aggressive clients from triggering multiple conversions.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateViewsMessage
member.summary: Message used to increment the view count for a specific variant version of a test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateViewsMessage.TestId
member.summary: ID of the test.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.Messaging.Messages.UpdateViewsMessage.ItemVersion
member.summary: Version of the variant to increment its view count.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.IMessagingManager
member.summary: Emits asynchronous messages for views, conversions, and KPI results.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.IMessagingManager.EmitUpdateViews(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Emits the asynchronous message to update the view result for the specified Variant version.
member.param: ID of a test.
Version of the cms item that was viewed.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.IMessagingManager.EmitUpdateConversion(System.Guid,System.Int32,System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Emits the asynchronous message to update a conversion result for the specified Variant version.
member.param: ID of a test.
Version of the CMS item that caused a conversion.
ID of the KPI that caused a conversion.
Optional client ID that will be used to throttle agressive clients and prevent multiple conversions.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.IMessagingManager.EmitKpiResultData(System.Guid,System.Int32,EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.IKeyResult,EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Core.DataClass.Enums.KeyResultType)
member.summary: Emits the asynchronous message to add a KPI result to the specified Variant version.
member.param: ID of a test.
Version of the CMS item that caused a conversion.
Result containing data pertinent to the KPI.
Type of the KPI result.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.IMessagingManager.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the queue.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.ITestingMessageHandler
member.summary: The message handler simply handles the messages and passes them on the registered ITestingMessageHandler which in turn handles the cache and database layer.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.MessagingManager
member.summary: The messaging manager provides an interface for sending asynchronous messages to update view and conversion data for a specific test. Since its a service it can be loaded via the standard service locator methods found in EpiServer.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.MessagingManager.#ctor(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.IServiceLocator,EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.ITestingMessageHandler)
member.summary: Used specifically for unit tests.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.MessagingManager.Init
member.summary: Initializes queue internals and registers the supported messages, note that the ITestingMessageHandler is retrieved from service locator so that we can mock it in tests.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Marketing.Testing.Messaging.TestingMessageHandler.#ctor(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.IServiceLocator)
member.summary: Used specifically for unit tests.
